metadata.title: President condoles demise of mother of Sindh Home Minister

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Sep 29 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari Monday expressed grief over the death of mother of Sindh Home Minister Zia-ul-Hassan Lanjar. The President prayed for the highest ranks of the deceased in heaven and for patience for the bereaved family. He said that demise of a mother was a cause of great sorrow and grief. The President expressed his sympathy and condolences to Zia-ul-Hassan Lanjar and his family.
